name: Linux Software Development Engineer
description:
We provide services and extensions to cover all aspects of application development related to Data Communication Product Line. The products developed by our team are widely used in all enterprise-level telecom projects at Huawei to help developers write better code and be more productive.

Our teams focuses on creating effective development tools like dynamic program analysis, profilers, bug predictions, all for embedded software in C/C++

Responsibilities:

  • Research and develop new algorithms for runtime and static product code analysis, including coverity, behavioral & call graph analysis;
  • Design & implement the code, utilities, unit tests & integration tests;
  • Research & analyze the behavior of the binary product code;
  • Write scripts to collect and analyze different types of information;
  • Implement new features according with customer requests;
  • Troubleshoot the problems in real embedded software environment;
  • Collaborate with internal and external team members to solve complex issues.

Requirements:

  • Good knowledge of C/C++;
  • Excellent knowledge of Linux System internals: processes/memory/POSIX;
  • Experience in system programming in user mode;
  • Strong problem-solving ability, knowledge of algorithms and complex data structures;
  • Strong troubleshooting ability, like core dump analysis, runtime debugging;
  • Knowledge/experience in assembly language (preferably: ARM), reverse engineering, binary code analysis;
  • Experience with one or many scripting languages like: Perl, Python, AWK, SED etc;
  • Experience with Linux kernel driver development will be a plus;
  • Knowledge of object-oriented development and design best practices will be a plus.

What we offer:

  • Work with cutting-edge technologies & challenging tasks in highly qualified international team;
  • Attractive compensation package;
  • Medical insurance with dental care included, and travel insurance;
  • Relocation bonus for candidates moving from other cities;
  • Modern comfortable office in the city center (“A” class business center located at Smolenskaya metro station).
